data.heading: Radio BBC Gahuza
data.bodySummary: Amakuru y’amahanga, ubusesenguzi, amakuru y’akarere k’ibiyaga bigari, ikinamico, ubuzima, imibereho y’abagore. Kuri FM no kuri internet.
